WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 14 JAN BY
   OCEANIC CHAMPION TOWING 12 8000 METER CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-49.00S 041-47.29W, 24-45.36S 041-40.07W,
   24-45.00S 041-40.34W, 24-41.00S 041-32.43W,
   25-24.41S 041-08.39W, 25-27.52S 041-16.51W,
   25-28.23S 041-16.26W, 25-32.05S 041-24.35W,
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3533/16.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 15 JAN 17.
